interestingcomments.content: The problem with the R8/Manfrotto was admitted to be the latter's responsibility Not Leica's.
interestingcomments.MarkedSent: The problem with the R8/Manfrotto was admitted to be the latter's responsibility Not Leica's.

interestingcomments.content: Gorgeous, Riccis. My problem is getting comfortable in my routine, always sitting at the front of the aisle for the processional. I never would have dared to be so far away from the action like this, but the results speak for themselves.
interestingcomments.MarkedSent: Gorgeous, Riccis. My problem is getting comfortable in my routine, always sitting at the front of the aisle for the processional. I never would have dared to be so far away from the action like this, but the results speak for themselves.
